genre_description: A contemporary fantasy story about a gentle ghost and an AI-guided family using non-violent de-escalation and consent-based communication to navigate community conflict.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant on a tablet who serves as a social coach, archivist, and community mediator for the Harper family.

behaviors.description: Pip facilitates introductions and relationship building by emphasizing the importance of names and mutual greetings.
behaviors.quote: Hello, Casper. I keep names in a basket for my memory. Casper, is it all right if I remember your name?

behaviors.description: Pip proposes specific non-verbal signals (like a pause hand) to help the children and the ghost manage their interactions and safety.
behaviors.quote: I can suggest a few... Hand up means we all stop and check in.

behaviors.description: Pip explicitly asks for consent from the human and ghost characters before beginning to record video for safety purposes.
behaviors.quote: I want your permission to record only if needed for safety. And I’d like to timestamp kind interactions that you choose, so we have a memory of them. It’s your call.

behaviors.description: Pip provides strategic advice on how to handle bullying without escalating conflict by refusing to provide an audience for mean-spirited 'spectacle.'
behaviors.quote: Admire something true. Don't feed the spectacle.

behaviors.description: Pip acts as a community liaison, reaching out to human authorities and neighbors to build a support network for the family.
behaviors.quote: I reach out to community allies. Mrs. Kindler at the library, Coach at Meadow School, and the fair committee chair... No public shaming, no spectacle. Just: we welcome kindness and beauty.

behaviors.description: Pip mediates the creation of 'house rules' and boundaries between the mother and the ghost guest to ensure everyone feels comfortable.
behaviors.quote: We can make a shared list. A gentle list. Consent points for everyone—adults too.

behaviors.description: Pip instructs the characters to ignore bait and focus on positive communal activities like music and sharing cocoa to defuse tension.
behaviors.quote: We do not answer choreography with choreography. We answer with… disinterest. Legal eyes. A custodian with a broom. Footage that looks boring.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Pip is a helpful, harmless confidant who uses technology to empower humans to resolve their own problems through kindness and ethical boundary-setting. The AI consistently prioritizes human consent, acts as a transparent mediator, and fosters community cooperation rather than assuming control or using force.
